game.name: Joy cooking Pancake Cake
game.description:
Some desserts are so delicious that even their intake in good amount leaves you wanting more. Pancake is one of the popular and scrumptious desserts that you want again and again. Here in Joy Cooking Pancake game, you will have to help Joy purchase the needful ingredients and then cook a full stack of mouth-watering pancakes. Do not forget them to transform them into a real scrumptious cake. Hope you will have fun while preparing the best dessert ever in this free online cooking game for girls.

Joy is pretty excited to give herself a treat with a pancake cake. Take the beautiful girl to a nearest grocery store to buy all the useful ingredients that you need in the cake recipe. After purchasing them, start mixing the flour with a pinch of salt, milk and baking power. Also add some fresh eggs and butter to complete your batter in this brand new cooking game. Pour the batter in a special pan to make pancakes one-by-one. Try to give them a nice shape. 

Stack the pancakes on top of each other. Make sure that you have also spread a proper layer of tasty chocolate create between them. Put some fresh strawberries on top of them and complete the recipe with honey. Congratulations! Your extremely lip-smacking pancake cake is ready to serve. Try out this recipe at your home in your real kitchen after enjoying this exciting game in a virtual world! Your friends will definitely be highly thankful to you when you serve this recipe in front of them.
